price: 55 Croient-ils que les richesses et les enfants que Nous leur accordons ici-bas
arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٖ وَبَنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: ayaḥsabūna annamā numidduhum bihi min mālin wabanīna
